Class PfEncoder

    public class PfEncoder
extends org.roxbotix.elibs2.robot.components.Encoder
implements Encoder
    Pathfinder-enabled encoders, designed to make your life easier than ever.

    If you don't know about how this bad boy works, you should go ahead and check out the original encoder class' documentation.

    Author:
    Colin Robertson

    • Field Detail

      • cpr

        private final double cpr

    • Constructor Detail

      • PfEncoder

        public PfEncoder​(int channelA,
                 int channelB,
                 boolean inverted,
                 double cpr)
        Create a new Pathfinder-enabled encoder.
        Parameters:
        channelA - the encoder's A channel.
        channelB - the encoder's B channel.
        inverted - whether or not the encoder is inverted. This means that the values the encoder sends are multiplied by -1: in essence, if you're driving the robot forwards and the encoder says you're going backwards, you might want to mess around with this setting.
        cpr - the encoder's CPR, or "counts per rotation."

    • Method Detail

      • getCpr

        public double getCpr()
        Get the encoder's CPR.

        In case you're entirely illiterate, CPR stands for "counts per rotation." Super cool, I know.

        Specified by:
        getCpr in interface Encoder
        Returns:
        the encoder's CPR.
